Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of immigration officer's decision on H&C application
Evidence_Assessment: Assessment of evidence regarding establishment in Canada and hardship in the Philippines
Burden_of_Proof: On applicant to demonstrate unusual or disproportionate hardship
Credibility_Factor: Credibility of Rocha's claims regarding HIV treatment and discrimination
Legal_Rule: H&C exemptions available under IRPA for unusual or disproportionate hardship
Procedural_Issue: Procedural fairness in assessment of H&C application
Grounds_for_Claim: Hardship due to HIV status, access to medical treatment, and discrimination in home country
Review_Standard: Reasonableness standard applied by Federal Court

Applicant_Challenge: Challenge to denial of H&C application based on alleged error in hardship assessment

Remedy_Requested: Permanent residence in Canada on H&C grounds

Legal_Provision: Section of IRPA related to humanitarian and compassionate considerations
Claimant_Status: Medically inadmissible foreign national applying for permanent residence
